name: GPT-Respond-Box
description: GPT-Respond-Box is an automated AI mailbox for businesses that can read, understand, and respond to emails. It is designed to help automate customer support, sales, and marketing tasks, as well as perform pre-setup tasks on behalf of the user.

stories.story: As a business owner, I want to ensure my customers receive timely responses to their support inquiries, even when human agents are not available.
stories.goal: Automate responses to common customer support inquiries
stories.workflow:
1. Triage incoming emails to identify common support inquiries.
2. Use AI/ML Core to analyze the content of the email for intent and sentiment.
3. Determine the appropriate pre-setup response for recognized inquiries or escalate if the request is unique or requires human intervention.
4. Compose an automated response using the AI/ML Core.
5. Send the response via the Networking & Communication module.
6. Notify the business team about the handled inquiry and its resolution status using the Notification module.
stories.sequence_diagram:
sequenceDiagram
participant Customer as Customer
participant GPT-Respond-Box as System
participant AIML_Core as AI/ML Core
participant Notification_Module as Notification
participant Network_Comm_Module as Networking & Communication
Customer->>System: Send support inquiry email
System->>AIML_Core: Analyze email content
AIML_Core-->>System: Intent and sentiment result
alt Inquiry recognized
    System->>AIML_Core: Retrieve corresponding response
    AIML_Core-->>System: Pre-setup response
    System->>Network_Comm_Module: Send response to Customer
    System->>Notification_Module: Notify business team of response
else Inquiry not recognized
    System->>Notification_Module: Escalate to human agent
end

stories.story: As a marketing manager, I want to send out automated marketing emails to segments of my customer base based on their preferences and behaviors.
stories.goal: Effectively target and automate marketing communications
stories.workflow:
1. Collect and segment the customer base according to preferences and behaviors using Analytics and Reporting module.
2. Create marketing content tailored to the different segments using Content Management module.
3. Train AI/ML Core to understand customer preferences and behaviors.
4. Configure AI/ML Core for automated email responses and to recognize triggers for sending marketing emails.
5. Integrate AI/ML Core with Content Management to match marketing content with customer segments.
6. Set up an automation schedule for sending out marketing emails through the AI/ML Core.
7. Monitor performance and collect data on marketing campaign effectiveness using the Analytics and Reporting module.
8. Refine marketing content and segmentation strategy based on performance data.
stories.sequence_diagram:
sequenceDiagram
    participant M as Marketing Manager
    participant A as Analytics and Reporting
    participant C as Content Management
    participant AI as AI/ML Core
    M->>A: Segment customer base
    A-->>M: Provide segmented data
    M->>C: Create marketing content
    C-->>M: Marketing content per segment
    M->>AI: Train on customer preferences
    AI-->>M: Training complete
    M->>AI: Configure for automated emails
    M->>AI: Integrate with Content Management
    AI->>C: Request content for segments
    C-->>AI: Provide matched content
    AI->>M: Automation ready
    M->>AI: Start email campaign
    AI->>A: Send campaign data
    A-->>M: Report campaign effectiveness
    M->>C: Refine content
    M->>A: Update segmentation strategy

stories.story: As a store manager, I want to use AI to sort customer emails regarding orders and automatically update order details in the system.
stories.goal: Streamline order management through email automation
stories.workflow:
1. Setup the AI/ML Core with email parsing capabilities to understand and categorize order-related emails. 
2. Establish e-mail fetching system to retrieve emails from the business mailbox using the Networking & Communication module.
3. Use the AI/ML Core to read and comprehend the content of each email, identifying order-related information. 
4. Validate and process the extracted order information against the current order management system using the Order Management module.
5. Automatically update the order details in the order management system based on the email's content.
6. Configure the AI/ML Core to send automated responses to customers to acknowledge the receipt and processing of their orders.
7. Establish a feedback loop to improve the accuracy of the AI/ML model over time with real-world data from the Order Management module.
stories.sequence_diagram:
sequenceDiagram
participant User as Store Manager
participant AI_ML_Core as AI/ML Core
participant Networking as Networking & Communication
participant Order_Management as Order Management
User->>Networking: Request to fetch emails
Networking-->>AI_ML_Core: Provide emails
AI_ML_Core->>AI_ML_Core: Parse and understand emails
AI_ML_Core->>Order_Management: Send order details
Order_Management->>Order_Management: Update order system
Order_Management-->>AI_ML_Core: Confirm update
AI_ML_Core->>Networking: Send response to customer
Networking-->>User: Notify about update completion
Order_Management->>AI_ML_Core: Provide data for AI improvement
AI_ML_Core->>AI_ML_Core: Learn from feedback

stories.story: As a user, I want to set up automatic email responses for certain tasks I manually predefine, such as sending invoices or booking confirmations.
stories.goal: Automate pre-setup tasks based on email interactions
stories.workflow:
1. Identify and classify incoming emails based on content and intent using the AI/ML Core module.
2. Based on predefined user settings, determine if the incoming email requires an automated action such as sending an invoice or booking confirmation.
3. Fetch required content (like invoice details or booking information) from the Content Management module.
4. Prepare an appropriate email response using Content Management module templates.
5. Schedule the prepared response for immediate or delayed delivery using the Scheduling module.
6. Send the response automatically to the sender.
7. Log the event and the response in the system for user's future review and potential analysis.
stories.sequence_diagram:
sequenceDiagram
    participant User
    participant AI_ML_Core as AI/ML Core
    participant Content_Management as Content Management
    participant Scheduling
    User->>AI_ML_Core: Classify incoming email
    AI_ML_Core->>User: Determine if action is needed
    User->>Content_Management: Request content for response
    Content_Management->>User: Provide content and templates
    User->>Scheduling: Schedule response delivery
    Scheduling->>User: Confirm response scheduled
    User->>AI_ML_Core: Send automatic email
    AI_ML_Core->>User: Log sent email
